data.title: Year
data.definition: This field indicates the last two digits of the year in which the mission occurred, i.e., for 1968.

data.title: Month
data.definition: This field indicates the two-digit code for the month in which the mission occurred, i.e., 01 for January.

data.title: Date
data.definition: This group contains the above two fields to include the year and month in which the mission occurred.

data.title: Target Country
data.data_values: VN: NORTH VIETNAM, VS: SOUTH VIETNAM, TH: THAILAND, UN: UNKNOWN
data.definition: This field contains a two-character code for the target country.

data.title: Unique Record Control
data.definition: This field contains a machine-generated number between 0001 and 99999 which ensures unique identification of the record. It is reinitialized to 00001 for each new month.

data.title: Record Identifier
data.definition: This group contains the Date, Cntry, and Cntrl elements for file record identification.

data.title: Service
data.code: A, J, M, N, V, W
data.data_values: A: ARVN; J: USAF; M: USMC; N: USN; V: VNAF; W: ARMY
data.definition: This field contains an alphabetic code for the launch service.

data.title: Aircraft
data.definition: This field contains the type, model, and series (TMS) of the sortie aircraft.

data.title: Target Type
data.definition: This field contains a code for the general type of target attacked.

data.title: Sortie Function
data.data_values: 01: STRIKE; 02: FLAK SUPPRESSION; 03: AIR INTERDICTION; 04: ARMED RECCE; 05: CLOSE AIR SUPPORT; 06: DIRECT AIR SUPPORT
data.definition: This field contains a code for sortie function; only the attack functions 01-06 are in the file.

data.title: Corps Area/Route Package
data.definition: This field contains a code for Corps Tactical Zone or Route Package.

data.title: Province
data.definition: This field contains a code for the province area in South Vietnam.

data.title: Prime/Secondary Indicator
data.definition: This field contains a 1 or 2 to indicate primary or secondary target.

data.title: Multi-Sortie Indicator
data.definition: This field will contain an M to indicate that this sortie has been counted elsewhere in the file against a different target or with a different sortie function. It is intended to avoid multiple counts of sorties flown.

data.title: Time of Day
data.data_values: M: DAWN; D: DAY; E: DUSK; N: NIGHT
data.definition: This field contains a code indicating the time of day of the mission.

data.title: Target Control
data.definition: This field contains a code describing the type of control in the target area used to direct the attacking aircraft to the target.

data.title: Sorties
data.definition: This field contains the total number of aircraft involved.

data.title: Flying Hours
data.definition: This field contains, to the nearest tenth of an hour, the total flying hours for the aircraft involved.

data.title: Target Element
data.definition: This field contains a code indicating the specific type of target element which was actually attacked.

data.title: Damage Description Code
data.definition: This field contains a code indicating the extent of damage to the target element.

data.title: Group for Set One
data.definition: This group contains the TARG and DCODE fields described above.

data.title: Passes
data.definition: This field contains the total number of individual passes at the target. If no passes are reported in CACTA, are assumed to be one per attack aircraft, i.e., the number of attacks.

data.title: Attacks
data.definition: This field contains the total attacking the target specified in TARG.

data.title: Results
data.definition: This field contains the number of target elements which are affected as described in DCODE.

data.title: Load Type Code
data.definition: This field contains a code for the category of ordnance expended.

data.title: Load Tonnage
data.definition: This field contains, to the nearest tenth of a pound, the total ordnance expended (delivered or jettisoned) during the mission.
